content: this hedgehog is made all in one piece no sewing together of body parts required **materials & tools** 8 yards tan worsted weight yarn 9 yards dark brown worsted weight yarn 3 6mm black safety eyes 1 as nose stuffing 3 5mm e crochet hook this pattern uses tapestry crochet 1 1 http //primarilypatterns blogspot com/2016/02/tapestry-crochet-tutorial html
